document_data.name: Huntingdown Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Huntingdown Hall''' was the residence of Lord [[Huntingdown (Lord)|Huntingdown]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: At some point after the massacre of the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlink|1479}}, the renegade [[wizard]] [[Elminster Aumar]] laid down alarm spells around Suzail to warn him if any [[blueflame ghosts]] became active around the city. His spells told him Lord Huntingdown was attacked by a [[Blueflame ghost]] in his residence at Huntingdown Hall at some point.
